description:
Using Ubuntu 18.04 - 64 bit.

If you cannot get this to work on YOUR system - just understand it is NOT the software at fault, it is YOUR computer configuration.

The installed languages listed are Arabic, Chinese, English, French, Russian and Spanish. 

If one of these is required by you for translation purposes then GREAT.  This is the translator for you. Install it. Use it. Enjoy it. You will not be disappointed.

Translation is carried out continuously, so the translated language is seen developing and changing context while you type, which I found interesting and useful, especially regarding the checking of context

Argos Translator has a simple interface, face and quite accurate. Plus, I understand it has the ability to work off line - although I've not tested that function.

So far all is good.

Although it took a while to install - (probably because of the various language packs), the Translator installed and runs without a hitch.

However, a search on Github (Nov 2020) does not reveal any additional language packs either available or under development, so 'Glate' will still have to remain as my principle translator, since it does not cover the languages for which I often need an accurate translation. - Dutch, Italian and some of the Scandinavian languages.

I would have given 5 stars but had to knock of a couple because of the very limited number of languages available. With greater language support the software deserves five stars at least.

Lets hope the developer(s) take this as encouragement to provide greater language support because this has the core of a really GOOD translating package

Alternatively, somebody else should be able to provide just the additional language packs for this translator.

Keep up the good work. I am truly sorry that I shall probably uninstall it because although I love the way Argos Translator works, I really don't need two translators.

Thisisi
summary: Very good translator but with limited available languages

description: Finally, an Offline Mode translator that produces good translations! In my initial tests en-de tests this appears to be comparable in quality to the likes of the DeepL and other popular services... the difference is that with this I no longer need to rely on a pinky-promise-oriented-architecture to protect my privacy. Thank you, Argos Translate!!

summary: test test test test test test

description: This app worked quite well at first and I was delighted to have such a useful translator that didn't need an internet connection. However, after a couple months it suddenly would no longer launch. Removing and reinstalling did nothing. An unfortunate bug I guess otherwise I would give more stars :(

I tried reinstalling. Didn't help ☹. It used to work.

Having an open-source offline translation tool was nice, though! Gonna keep on checking until it runs someday.
Translations don't seem to be very accurate for some languages though.

This snap used to work well. Version 1.6.5 does not work.

OMP: Error #179: Function Can't open SHM2 failed:
OMP: System error #2: No such file or directory
Aborted (core dumped)
Lt. Screenshot wäre es genau das Programm das ich benötige, aber was hilft das, wenn es nicht startet. Bitte nachbessern. Danke!
Здравствуйте, доброе утро, правда в том, что этот трансдуцитор - настоящий сухой мусор, который говорит вам, что этот сливочный пирог - правда.
Неплохой переводчик, особенно офлайн. Конечно иногда допускает ошибки, но со временем обучится и всё будет хорошо.
Не удалось установить. Система Ubuntu 20.04.2 LTS. Поставил 5 звезд
Так ничего и не смог перевести :(
词库太小了，很多词翻不出来，翻出来也不达意
